price: Nayo ni Jahannamu! Wataingia humo. Nacho hicho ni kitanda kiovu mno cha kulalia.
footnotes: Na mwisho huo ni Jahannamu watakayo iingia, na moto wake uwatese. Na malalio maovu mno hayo!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
